title: SWIFT, Axis Bank launch AI pilot to tackle payment fraud
description: The pilot is expected to leverage a secure infrastructure that will enable financial institutions to exchange relevant information with strong privacy-preserving controls, according to the two partners. SWIFT's AI anomaly detection model will then be able to gather insights and identify potential fraud patterns from a much richer dataset, they said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
